creator: BATALSOFT MUSIC APPS
descriptionHtml:
Have fun and enjoy the amazing experience of drumming with this multitouch acoustic drum kit simulator. Play this game with your fingers (as it they were sticks) in your mobile phone or tablet. This drum set game is free, it has fast response, and includes different sound bank sets recorded with studio quality.

Record your songs and show them to your friends later. Play music loud with headset for a superior experience. Drum Solo HD is designed for everyone: children, percussionists, musicians, drummers...

The main features are:
- High number of exclusive demo rhythm presets to learn to play drums
- Choose between 4 complete audio packs: Classic Rock, Heavy Metal, Jazz and Synthesizer
- Record your own session and later, you can play on it, like a real drumset machine. Double your experience!. You can record, play and repeat your compositions. You can record un unlimited number of notes in your loops.
- Export your sessions to MP3 and share your progression with your friends
- Left-handed mode
- Play drums on your favorite MP3 songs from your music library
- Adjust each instrument individual volume and global music volume
- Immersion haptic feedback (tactile effects) for a better experience
- Unlike most percussion apps, drag your finger for different drums and play an incredible solo (watch the video sample)
- Multitouch drums. You can touch up to 20 fingers simultaneously.
- Reverb effect simulates a live performance.
- Realistic HQ sampled stereo sounds, including double kick bass, two toms, floor, snare, hi-hat (open and closed with the pedal), splash, crash, cymbal
- HD drums images.
- Double bass drum pedal available.
- Animations for each instrument
- Repeat button in order to play continuously your improvisations (playback mode).
- Low latency for the beats (note: depending of your available memory and processor)
- 11 touch sensitive touch pads.
- Very fast loading time
- Use it in conjunction with the rest of Batalsoft apps (bass, piano, guitar...) to form your own band.
- You can remove ads acquiring a license

Join us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/Batalsoft-393859114012583
descriptionShort: The best drums and percussion game. Multiple pads to play. Become a real drummer

06006 Badajoz
Spain
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Reduced app size and improved performance
- New and updated engine and design
- Better animations and effects
- 4 brand new drum kits
- Fixed a bug that caused the speed control not showing in certain cases
- Fixed a bug that caused some demos won't load
- Minor bugs

title: Drum Solo HD

container.value:
Parque Científico y Tecnológico de Extremadura
Avenida de la Investigación s/n B25
06006 Badajoz
Spain

creator: BATALSOFT MUSIC APPS
descriptionHtml:
Om pret te hê en geniet die wonderlike ervaring van dromme met hierdie multitouch akoestiese tromstel simulator. Speel hierdie speletjie saam met jou vingers (as dit hulle stokke) in jou selfoon of tablet. Hierdie inligting is gratis, dit het vinnige reaksie en sluit verskillende klank bank stelle aangeteken met studio kwaliteit.

Teken jou songs en wys dit aan jou vriende later. Speel musiek hard met headset vir 'n beter ervaring. Drum Solo HD is ontwerp vir almal: van beginners tot die mees gevorderde drummers.

Die belangrikste kenmerke is:

- Baie maklik om te gebruik
- Groot prestasie (ook vir lae einde toestelle)
- Vinnigste reaksie
- Hoë aantal eksklusiewe lesse om te leer om dromme te speel
- Kies tussen 4 volledige klank pakke: Classic Rock, Swaar Metaal, Jazz en Synthesizer
- Teken jou eie sessie en later, kan jy speel op dit, soos 'n ware drumset masjien. Verdubbel jou ervaring !. Jy kan rekord, speel en herhaal jou komposisies. Jy kan un onbeperkte aantal notas aan te teken in jou loops.
- Voer jou sessies te MP3, MIDI of OGG en deel jou vordering met jou vriende
- Speel jou gunsteling liedjies uit jou musiek biblioteek en voeg jou eie slae
- Left-handed af avaiable
- Eers elke instrument individuele volume en globale musiek volume
- Onderdompeling hapties terugvoer (tasbare effekte) vir 'n beter ervaring
- Multitouch dromme. Jy kan gelyktydig raak tot 20 vingers.
- Galm effek simuleer 'n live performance.
- Realistiese HQ gemonsterde stereo klanke, insluitende dubbele kick bas, twee toms, vloer, strik, hi-hoed (oop en geslote met die pedaal), spat, crash, simbaal
- HD dromme beelde en 'n groot animasie.
- Double bass drum pedal beskikbaar.
- 11 touch sensitiewe touch pads.
- Drum Solo HD is gratis, maar jy kan advertensies en ontsluit lessos en toekomstige elemente te verwyder deur die verkryging van 'n permanente lisensie

Sluit aan by ons op Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/Batalsoft
descriptionShort: 🥁 Die beste perkussie spel. Verskeie boekies te speel. 'N ware tromspeler

appDetails.developerAddress:
Parque Científico y Tecnológico de Extremadura
Avenida de la Investigación s/n B25
06006 Badajoz
Spain
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Latency decreased up to the half
- Audio encoding time reduced up to 10X
- Now you can also export audio to MIDI and OGG formats
- Now you can disable animations (this can improve dramatically performance in low-end devices)
- New lessons
- Minor visual changes

title: Drum Solo HD  -  The best drumming game

container.value:
Parque Científico y Tecnológico de Extremadura
Avenida de la Investigación s/n B25
06006 Badajoz
Spain

creator: BATALSOFT MUSIC APPS
descriptionHtml:
Have fun and enjoy the amazing experience of playing this acoustic drum simulator. Use it with your fingers (as if they were drumsticks) on your mobile or tablet. Drum Solo HD is free, has immediate response and includes different sound packs recorded with studio quality.

Record your songs and show them to your friends later. Play music loud and use it with headphones or connected to a stereo with speakers for a unique experience. It is designed for everyone: from beginners to professional drummers.

The main features are:

- Extremely intuitive and easy to use.
- Excellent performance (also on old devices)
- Instant response
- Learn to play the drums with multiple lessons.
- Choose from 4 exclusive sound packs: Classic Rock, Heavy Metal, Jazz and Synthesizer.
- Record your own session and later, play over it, just like a real drum machine. Double your experience! You can record, play and repeat your compositions. You can record an unlimited number of notes in your loops.
- Export your sessions to MP3, MIDI or OGG and share your progress with friends.
- Play over your favorite songs from your music library and add your own beats.
- Left-handed mode available.
- Individually adjust the volume of each instrument and global music.
- Immersive tactile effects (haptic feedback) so that when you touch, the device responds as in reality (NOTE: only if the device has vibration available).
- Multi-touch: it can be used with 20 fingers simultaneously (if available on your device).
- The Reverb effect simulates a live performance.
- High quality sounds recorded in stereo, including double kick, two toms, floor snare, snare, charlie or hi-hat (with two positions), splash, crash and cymbal cymbals.
- High definition images and spectacular animations.
- Double bass drum pedal available.
- 11 sensitive areas.
- Drum Solo HD is free, but you can purchase a license to permanently remove the ads and to unlock lessons and other exclusive items in the future

Follow us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/Batalsoft
descriptionShort: 🥁 The best percussion game. Become a real drummer!

- Record your own session and later, play over it, just like a real drum machine. Double your experience! You can record, play and repeat your compositions. You can record an unlimited number of notes in your loops.
- Export your sessions to MP3, MIDI or OGG and share your progress with friends.
- Play over your favorite songs from your music library and add your own beats.
- Left-handed mode available.
- Individually adjust the volume of each instrument and global music.
- Immersive tactile effects (haptic feedback) so that when you touch, the device responds as in reality (NOTE: only if the device has vibration available).
- Multi-touch: it can be used with 20 fingers simultaneously (if available on your device).
- The Reverb effect simulates a live performance.
- High quality sounds recorded in stereo, including double kick, two toms, floor snare, snare, charlie or hi-hat (with two positions), splash, crash and cymbal cymbals.
- High definition images and spectacular animations.
- Double bass drum pedal available.
- 11 sensitive areas.
- Drum Solo HD is free, but you can purchase a license to permanently remove the ads and to unlock lessons and other exclusive items in the future

Follow us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/Batalsoft
descriptionShort: The definitive percussion game. Become a real drummer!

descriptionHtml:
Have fun and enjoy the amazing experience of playing this acoustic drum simulator. Use it with your fingers (as if they were drumsticks) on your mobile or tablet. Drum Solo HD is free, has immediate response and includes different sound packs recorded with studio quality.

Record your songs and show them to your friends later. Play music loud and use it with headphones or connected to a stereo with speakers for a unique experience. It is designed for everyone: from beginners to professional drummers.

The main features are:

- Extremely intuitive and easy to use.
- Excellent performance (also on old devices)
- Instant response
- Learn to play the drums with multiple lessons.
- Choose from 4 exclusive sound packs: Classic Rock, Heavy Metal, Jazz and Synthesizer.
- Record your own session and later, play over it, just like a real drum machine. Double your experience! You can record, play and repeat your compositions. You can record an unlimited number of notes in your loops.
- Export your sessions to MP3, MIDI or OGG and share your progress with friends.
- Play over your favorite songs from your music library and add your own beats.
- Left-handed mode available.
- Individually adjust the volume of each instrument and global music.
- Immersive tactile effects (haptic feedback) so that when you touch, the device responds as in reality (NOTE: only if the device has vibration available).
- Multi-touch: it can be used with 20 fingers simultaneously (if available on your device).
- The Reverb effect simulates a live performance.
- High quality sounds recorded in stereo, including double kick, two toms, floor snare, snare, charlie or hi-hat (with two positions), splash, crash and cymbal cymbals.
- High definition images and spectacular animations.
- Double bass drum pedal available.
- 11 sensitive areas.
- Drum Solo HD is free, but you can purchase a license to permanently remove the ads and to unlock lessons and other exclusive items in the future

Follow us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/Batalsoft
